content.zh-CN: 在`视图`-`报表`导出全年报表吧，看看今年记录了多少时间
content.en-US: Export the full-year report in `View`-`Report` to see how much time has been recorded this year

content.zh-CN:
公告功能现已上线，以后会在此处更新一些通知还请留意

接下来我要说件很重要的事，那就是这个软件是有**开机启动**这个设置的，没错，大概就这样
content.en-US:
The announcement function is now online. Please pay attention to the updates here in the future.

Next, I want to say something very important, that is, this software has a setting of **Auto start**, yes, that's it.
